plot: Ammon and his brothers leave the land of the Nephites to teach the Lamanites about Christ. Through faithful servitude, Ammon helps convert King Lamoni and his people
title: Ammon and the Lamanites
plot_es: Ammon and his brothers leave the land of the Nephites to teach the Lamanites about Christ. Through faithful servitude, Ammon helps convert King Lamoni and his people
plot_en: Ammon and his brothers leave the land of the Nephites to teach the Lamanites about Christ. Through faithful servitude, Ammon helps convert King Lamoni and his people
